title: Absalom’s Death
summary: David’s army defeats Absalom’s forces. Absalom is caught in a tree by his hair and killed by Joab, despite David’s orders to spare him. A messenger brings the news to David, who mourns deeply for his son.

faq.question: How did Absalom die?
faq.answer: His hair got caught in a tree, and Joab killed him while he was helpless.

faq.question: How did David react to Absalom’s death?
faq.answer: He wept bitterly, crying, ‘O my son Absalom!’
